tool_description: Highload digital white-label banking platform that helps financial businesses to grow fast, scalable and reliable.
name: FinHost
title: FinHost

api_list.name: /account/
api_list.description: Return the list of the balances for the client accounts
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finhost.p.rapidapi.com/account/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finhost.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://finhost.p.rapidapi.com/account/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finhost.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

holding.description: Total sum of currency on hold for the account (out coming from the account)

pending.description: Total sum of currency waiting to be added (incoming to the account)

created.description: When the account was created in RFC 3339 (section 5.6)

updated.description: Time of the last update in RFC 3339 (section 5.6)

api_list.name: /account/details/{account}

test_endpoint.messages: The API is unreachable, please contact the API provider

api_list.name: /posting/{account}
api_list.description: List assets transfers for the account

optional_parameters.name: lastActionKey
optional_parameters.description: Last actionKey to start with the next page

actionKey.description: Posting action key. Transfer action in RFC 3339 (section 5.6)

action.description: Description for the posting action (Recipient title).

available.description: Available amount of currency on account before transfer started

balance.description: Balance on account before transfer started

api_list.name: /recipient/search/{currency}
api_list.description: Receive recipient info and default account

clientName.description: Recipient short name (name and the first letter of surname)

account.description: Recipient default account identifier for appropriate currency

api_list.name: /recipient
api_list.description: List of the recipients for the client

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Response page size (default is equal to 10)

optional_parameters.name: lastRecipientKey
optional_parameters.description: Last recipientKey to start with the next page

recipientKey.description: Unique key for the recipient based on date

created.description: When the recipient profile was created in RFC 3339 (section 5.6)

recipientKey.description: Unique key for the recipient based on date

created.description: When the recipient profile was created in RFC 3339 (section 5.6)

accountTo.description: System account to which money will income

api_list.name: /sumsub/access-token
api_list.description: Requests customer token to initialize Sumsub SDK
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finhost.p.rapidapi.com/sumsub/access-token"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finhost.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

token.description: A newly generated access token for an applicant

verifier.description: The service that verifies an applicant

applicant.description: Applicant ID in the verification service

api_list.name: /fee/payment
api_list.description: Calculates transfer payment according to the fee plan

api_list.name: /fee/plans
api_list.description: Describes fee payments for the services

api_list.name: /account/
api_list.description: Initiate a process of creation a new financial account for the customer
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finhost.p.rapidapi.com/account/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finhost.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
